List of Presentations

    GitHub Foundations
    A thorough course on GitHub and Git used in GitHub:Training classrooms

    GitHub First Look
    Beginning look at using GitHub, a collaborative development platform

    GitHub Pages
    Thorough coverage of what GitHub Pages are and how to get started using them

    GitHub Advanced
    Advanced Git techniques for the experienced Git user

    GitHub API
    A review of GitHub's RESTful JSON-speaking API for interacting with repositories and teams

    GitHub and Git For Publishers
    Presentation for publishers, writers, and editors looking to use GitHub and Git as a collaboration system
